title: Bump futures from 0.3.16 to 0.3.17

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:
Bumps [futures](https://github.com/rust-lang/futures-rs) from 0.3.16 to 0.3.17.
Release notes

Sourced from futures's releases.

0.3.17

  • Use FuturesOrdered in join_all (#2412)
  • Add {future, stream}::poll_immediate (#2452)
  • Add stream_select! macro (#2262)
  • Implement Default for OptionFuture (#2471)
  • Add Peekable::{peek_mut, poll_peek_mut} (#2488)
  • Add BufReader::seek_relative (#2489)
Changelog

Sourced from futures's changelog.

0.3.17 - 2021-08-30

  • Use FuturesOrdered in join_all (#2412)
  • Add {future, stream}::poll_immediate (#2452)
  • Add stream_select! macro (#2262)
  • Implement Default for OptionFuture (#2471)
  • Add Peekable::{peek_mut, poll_peek_mut} (#2488)
  • Add BufReader::seek_relative (#2489)
Commits
  • 7caefa5 Release 0.3.17
  • 3f064f4 Create GitHub release automatically
  • 1c9b1c2 Update changelog
  • efcdda8 Add BufReader::seek_relative (#2489)
  • 8b39aa1 Add Peekable::{peek_mut, poll_peek_mut} (#2488)
  • 302444b Remove remaining cfg(target_has_atomic) (#2487)
  • 77c148f Prefer doc(no_inline) to doc(hidden) for reexports (#2479)
  • ccb59ce Implement Default trait for OptionFuture (#2471)
  • a74e4e5 Add stream_select macro (#2262)
  • 79965bd New poll_immediate functions to immediately return from a poll (#2452)
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=futures&package-manager=cargo&previous-version=0.3.16&new-version=0.3.17)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---

title: Bump tokio from 1.10.1 to 1.11.0

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:
Bumps [tokio](https://github.com/tokio-rs/tokio) from 1.10.1 to 1.11.0.
Release notes

Sourced from tokio's releases.

Tokio v1.11.0

1.11.0 (August 31, 2021)

Fixed

  • time: don't panic when Instant is not monotonic (#4044)
  • io: fix panic in fill_buf by not calling poll_fill_buf twice (#4084)

Added

  • watch: add watch::Sender::subscribe (#3800)
  • process: add from_std to ChildStd* (#4045)
  • stats: initial work on runtime stats (#4043)

Changed

  • tracing: change span naming to new console convention (#4042)
  • io: speed-up waking by using uninitialized array (#4055, #4071, #4075)

Documented

  • time: make Sleep examples easier to find (#4040)

#3800: tokio-rs/tokio#3800 #4040: tokio-rs/tokio#4040 #4042: tokio-rs/tokio#4042 #4043: tokio-rs/tokio#4043 #4044: tokio-rs/tokio#4044 #4045: tokio-rs/tokio#4045 #4055: tokio-rs/tokio#4055 #4071: tokio-rs/tokio#4071 #4075: tokio-rs/tokio#4075 #4084: tokio-rs/tokio#4084

Commits
  • 9a97eb3 chore: prepare Tokio v1.11.0 (#4083)
  • 1409041 io: fix fill_buf by not calling poll_fill_buf twice (#4084)
  • 23b0aee tokio-util: expose key used in DelayQueue's Expired (#4081)
  • 909d3ec stream: add From\<Receiver<T>> impl for receiver streams (#4080)
  • b67d464 process: skip the process_kill_on_drop test if bash is not installed. (#4079)
  • 98578a6 stats: initial work on runtime stats (#4043)
  • 8a097d2 util: add safety comment to assume_init (#4075)
  • 1e2e38b sync: use WakeList in Notify and batch_semaphore (#4071)
  • 80bda3b macros: fix wrong error messages (#4067)
  • 51f4f05 io: speed-up waking by using uninitialized array (#4055)
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=tokio&package-manager=cargo&previous-version=1.10.1&new-version=1.11.0)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---

title: Bump bytes from 1.0.1 to 1.1.0

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:
Bumps [bytes](https://github.com/tokio-rs/bytes) from 1.0.1 to 1.1.0.
Release notes

Sourced from bytes's releases.

Bytes v1.1.0

1.1.0 (August 25, 2021)

Added

  • BufMut::put_bytes(self, val, cnt) (#487)
  • Implement From<Box<[u8]>> for Bytes (#504)

Changed

  • Override put_slice for &mut [u8] (#483)
  • Panic on integer overflow in Chain::remaining (#482)
  • Add inline tags to UninitSlice methods (#443)
  • Override copy_to_bytes for Chain and Take (#481)
  • Keep capacity when unsplit on empty other buf (#502)

Documented

  • Clarify BufMut allocation guarantees (#501)
  • Clarify BufMut::put_int behavior (#486)
  • Clarify actions of clear and truncate. (#508)

#443: tokio-rs/bytes#443 #481: tokio-rs/bytes#481 #482: tokio-rs/bytes#482 #483: tokio-rs/bytes#483 #486: tokio-rs/bytes#486 #487: tokio-rs/bytes#487 #501: tokio-rs/bytes#501 #502: tokio-rs/bytes#502 #504: tokio-rs/bytes#504 #508: tokio-rs/bytes#508

Changelog

Sourced from bytes's changelog.

1.1.0 (August 25, 2021)

Added

  • BufMut::put_bytes(self, val, cnt) (#487)
  • Implement From<Box<[u8]>> for Bytes (#504)

Changed

  • Override put_slice for &mut [u8] (#483)
  • Panic on integer overflow in Chain::remaining (#482)
  • Add inline tags to UninitSlice methods (#443)
  • Override copy_to_bytes for Chain and Take (#481)
  • Keep capacity when unsplit on empty other buf (#502)

Documented

  • Clarify BufMut allocation guarantees (#501)
  • Clarify BufMut::put_int behavior (#486)
  • Clarify actions of clear and truncate. (#508)
Commits
  • ebc61e5 chore: prepare bytes v1.1.0 (#509)
  • 55e2968 Clarifying actions of clear and truncate. (#508)
  • 0e9fa0b impl From<Box for Bytes (#504)
  • ee24be7 ci: fetch cargo hack from github release (#507)
  • 2697fa7 BufMut::put_bytes(self, val, cnt) (#487)
  • fa9cbf1 Clarify BufPut::put_int behavior (#486)
  • ab8e3c0 Clarify BufMut allocation guarantees (#501)
  • f34dc5c Remove doc URLs (#498)
  • baaf12d Keep capacity when unsplit on empty other buf (#502)
  • ed1d24e Use ubuntu-latest instead of ubuntu-16.04 (#497)
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

title: Bump hyper from 0.14.11 to 0.14.12

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:
Bumps [hyper](https://github.com/hyperium/hyper) from 0.14.11 to 0.14.12.
Release notes

Sourced from hyper's releases.

v0.14.12

Bug Fixes

  • ffi: on_informational callback had no headers (39b6d01a)
  • http1: apply header title case for consecutive dashes (#2613) (684f2fa7)
  • http2: improve errors emitted by HTTP2 Upgraded stream shutdown (#2622) (be08648e)

Features

  • client: expose http09 and http1 options on client::conn::Builder (#2611) (73bff4e9, closes #2461)
Changelog

Sourced from hyper's changelog.

v0.14.12 (2021-08-24)

Bug Fixes

  • ffi: on_informational callback had no headers (39b6d01a)
  • http1: apply header title case for consecutive dashes (#2613) (684f2fa7)
  • http2: improve errors emitted by HTTP2 Upgraded stream shutdown (#2622) (be08648e)

Features

  • client: expose http09 and http1 options on client::conn::Builder (#2611) (73bff4e9, closes #2461)
Commits
  • f46b175 v0.14.12
  • 39b6d01 fix(ffi): on_informational callback had no headers
  • adaa8b3 chore(dependencies): require httparse 1.5.1
  • 95a9783 refactor(http1): use MaybeUninit for parsing with uninitialized headers (#2545)
  • be08648 fix(http2): improve errors emitted by HTTP2 Upgraded stream shutdown (#2622)
  • 9a113ed docs(capi): fix typo in the upload example build (#2626)
  • a1995ee docs(capi): build 'upload' example too by default (#2625)
  • 3b26572 refactor(ffi): check pointer arguments for NULL (#2624)
  • c351539 docs(capi): output the hyper_version in the capi examples (#2623)
  • 684f2fa fix(http1): apply header title case for consecutive dashes (#2613)
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=hyper&package-manager=cargo&previous-version=0.14.11&new-version=0.14.12)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. title: Bump tokio from 1.9.0 to 1.10.0

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:
Bumps [tokio](https://github.com/tokio-rs/tokio) from 1.9.0 to 1.10.0.
Release notes

Sourced from tokio's releases.

Tokio v1.10.0

1.10.0 (August 12, 2021)

Added

  • io: add (read|write)_f(32|64)[_le] methods (#4022)
  • io: add fill_buf and consume to AsyncBufReadExt (#3991)
  • process: add Child::raw_handle() on windows (#3998)

Fixed

  • doc: fix non-doc builds with --cfg docsrs (#4020)
  • io: flush eagerly in io::copy (#4001)
  • runtime: a debug assert was sometimes triggered during shutdown (#4005)
  • sync: use spin_loop_hint instead of yield_now in mpsc (#4037)
  • tokio: the test-util feature depends on rt, sync, and time (#4036)

Changes

  • runtime: reorganize parts of the runtime (#3979, #4005)
  • signal: make windows docs for signal module show up on unix builds (#3770)
  • task: quickly send task to heap on debug mode (#4009)

Documented

  • io: document cancellation safety of AsyncBufReadExt (#3997)
  • sync: document when watch::send fails (#4021)

#3770: tokio-rs/tokio#3770 #3979: tokio-rs/tokio#3979 #3991: tokio-rs/tokio#3991 #3997: tokio-rs/tokio#3997 #3998: tokio-rs/tokio#3998 #4001: tokio-rs/tokio#4001 #4005: tokio-rs/tokio#4005 #4009: tokio-rs/tokio#4009 #4020: tokio-rs/tokio#4020 #4021: tokio-rs/tokio#4021 #4022: tokio-rs/tokio#4022 #4036: tokio-rs/tokio#4036 #4037: tokio-rs/tokio#4037

Commits
  • c0974ba chore: prepare Tokio v1.10.0 (#4038)
  • b67534a tests: fix flaky test (#4024)
  • c4e5623 sync: use spin_loop_hint instead of yield_now in mpsc (#4037)
  • 84c4a6d task: quickly send task to heap on debug mode (#4009)
  • b501f25 runtime: give Notified a safe API (#4005)
  • 032c55e tokio: the test-util feature depends on rt, sync, and time (#4036)
  • 1e95d69 chore: explicitly relaxed clippy lint for runtime entry macro (#4030)
  • 362df5a io: add test for write_f(32|64)[_le] (#4026)
  • 106bb94 io: add (read|write)_f(32|64)[_le] methods (#4022)
  • 8198ef3 chore: fix clippy warnings (#4017)

title: Bump tokio from 1.8.2 to 1.9.0

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:
Bumps [tokio](https://github.com/tokio-rs/tokio) from 1.8.2 to 1.9.0.
Release notes

Sourced from tokio's releases.

Tokio v1.9.0

1.9.0 (July 19, 2021)

Added

  • net: allow customized I/O operations for TcpStream (#3888)
  • sync: add getter for the mutex from a guard (#3928)
  • task: expose nameable future for TaskLocal::scope (#3273)

Fixed

  • Fix leak if output of future panics on drop (#3967)
  • Fix leak in LocalSet (#3978)

Changes

  • runtime: reorganize parts of the runtime (#3909, #3939, #3950, #3955, #3980)
  • sync: clean up OnceCell (#3945)
  • task: remove mutex in JoinError (#3959)

#3273: tokio-rs/tokio#3273 #3888: tokio-rs/tokio#3888 #3909: tokio-rs/tokio#3909 #3928: tokio-rs/tokio#3928 #3934: tokio-rs/tokio#3934 #3939: tokio-rs/tokio#3939 #3945: tokio-rs/tokio#3945 #3950: tokio-rs/tokio#3950 #3955: tokio-rs/tokio#3955 #3959: tokio-rs/tokio#3959 #3967: tokio-rs/tokio#3967 #3978: tokio-rs/tokio#3978 #3980: tokio-rs/tokio#3980

Commits
  • b280c6d chore: prepare Tokio v1.9.0 (#3961)
  • 998dc5a task: fix leak in LocalSet (#3978)
  • ced7992 runtime: add large test and fix leak it found (#3967)
  • 0cefa85 runtime: make scheduler non-optional (#3980)
  • 2087f3e runtime: rework binding of new tasks (#3955)
  • 5ae2855 io: fix docs referring to clear_{read,write}_ready (#3957)
  • 2520048 sync: add getter for the mutex from a guard (#3928)
  • 549e89e chore: use the loom mutex wrapper everywhere (#3958)
  • c8fc492 Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/tokio-1.8.x' into merge-1.8
  • 7c4183a runtime: drop future when polling cancelled future (#3965)
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

title: Bump hyper from 0.14.9 to 0.14.10

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:
Bumps [hyper](https://github.com/hyperium/hyper) from 0.14.9 to 0.14.10.
Release notes

Sourced from hyper's releases.

v0.14.10

Bug Fixes

  • http1:
    • reject content-lengths that have a plus sign prefix (06335158) (Security GHSA-f3pg-qwvg-p99c)
    • protect against overflow in chunked decoder (efd9a982) (Security GHSA-5h46-h7hh-c6x9)

Features

  • ffi: add option to get raw headers from response (8c89a8c1)
Changelog

Sourced from hyper's changelog.

v0.14.10 (2021-07-07)

Bug Fixes

  • http1:
    • reject content-lengths that have a plus sign prefix (06335158)
    • protect against overflow in chunked decoder (efd9a982)

Features

  • ffi: add option to get raw headers from response (8c89a8c1)
Commits
  • 9b69cbc v0.14.10
  • 1fb719e fix(http1): reject content-lengths that have a plus sign prefix
  • 1068b99 fix(http1): protect against overflow in chunked decoder
  • 11cb472 refactor(http2): fix unstable name clash of Cursor::remaining
  • 13594c3 chore(github): merge duplicate issue templates
  • c60a9dd chore(github): add issue templates
  • 8c89a8c feat(ffi): add option to get raw headers from response
  • 08b2138 refactor(error): add header parse error details in hyper::Error
  • ea8b0cd refactor(error): remove PartialEq derives for error kind enums
  • See full diff in compare view
